entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
